title: The Modern Jazz Quartet - Third Stream Music (1960) [EAC-FLAC]
description:
The Modern Jazz Quartet - Third Stream Music (1960) [EAC-FLAC]
             EAC rip (secure mode) | FLAC (tracks)+CUE+LOG -> 214 Mb 
                     Full Artwork @ 600 dpi (jpg) -> 117 Mb 



This Atlantic release has some unusual performances by the Modern Jazz Quartet. 

Two selections ("Da Capo" and "Fine") combine the MJQ, which is comprised of vibraphonist Milt Jackson, pianist John Lewis, bassist Percy Heath, and drummer Connie Kay, with the Jimmy Giuffre 3 (Giuffre on clarinet and tenor, with guitarist Jim Hall and bassist Ralph Pena) on "Exposure"; six chamber classical musicians add color, and a pair of other numbers ("Conversation" and the very successful "Sketch") match the MJQ with the Beaux Arts String Quartet. There is plenty of thought-provoking music on this disc even if the idea of creating a third stream between jazz and classical music never came to pass.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*2013 Warner Japan / Atlantic / Rhino | WPCR-27307 Jazz Best Collection 1000 Series

Connie Kay - drums
Jimmy Giuffre - clarinet
Jim Hall - guitar
